snippet: Knoedler & Co., an art gallery that recently closed after 165 years in business, is selling off its remaining inventory at auction.
abstract: Knoedler & Co., an art gallery that recently closed after 165 years in business, is selling off its remaining inventory at auction.

headline.main: Knoedler Gallery to Auction Its Inventory
headline.print_headline: Knoedler Gallery to Auction Off Artworks
